TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IChannelListener implements class System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject

summary.span: 定義通道接聽程式 (Listener) 必須實作以接受通道的介面。

span.span: Defines the interface that must be implemented by a channel listener to accept channels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 介面表示通道接聽程式的基底介面。The interface represents the base interface for channel listeners. 通道接聽程式和其關聯的通道通常是由可接收用戶端啟始之通訊的服務所使用。Channel listeners and their associated channels are generally used by services that receive communications initiated by clients. 相較之下，實作 介面的通道處理站會提供用來建立通道的機制，透過此機制可啟始與服務之間的通訊。Channel factories that implement the interface, by contrast, provide the mechanisms used to create the channels through which communication with a service is initiated.

MemberSignature.Value: public IAsyncResult BeginWaitForChannel (TimeSpan timeout, AsyncCallback callback, object state);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.IAsyncResult BeginWaitForChannel(valuetype System.TimeSpan timeout, class System.AsyncCallback callback, object state) cil managed
Public Function BeginWaitForChannel (timeout As TimeSpan, callback As AsyncCallback, state As Object) As IAsyncResult
public: IAsyncResult ^ BeginWaitForChannel(TimeSpan timeout, AsyncCallback ^ callback, System::Object ^ state);

param.name: timeout
param.span: 指定在逾時前必須等候通道作業完成之時間的 。

span.span: The that specifies how long the wait for a channel operation has to complete before timing out.

param.name: callback
param.span: 委派 (Delegate)，可在非同步等候通道作業完成時，收到通知。

span.span: The delegate that receives the notification of the asynchronous completion of the wait for a channel operation.

param.name: state
param.span: 應用程式所指定的物件，其中包含與等候通道之非同步作業相關聯的狀態資訊。

span.span: An object, specified by the application, that contains state information associated with the asynchronous wait for a channel operation.

summary.span: 開始等候通道抵達的非同步作業，此作業必須在指定的時間間隔內完成。

span.span: Begins an asynchronous operation to wait for a channel to arrive that must be completed within a specified interval of time.

returns.span: 參考非同步等候通道作業的 。

span.span: The that references the asynchronous wait for a channel operation.

MemberSignature.Value: public T GetProperty<T> () where T : class;
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance !!T GetProperty<class T>() cil managed
Public Function GetProperty(Of T As Class) () As T

typeparam.name: T
typeparam.span: 此方法正在查詢的型別物件。

span.span: The typed object for which the method is querying.

summary.span: 從通道堆疊的適當層次中，傳回要求的型別物件 (如果有)。

span.span: Returns a typed object requested, if present, from the appropriate layer in the channel stack.

returns.span: 要求的型別物件 (如果存在的話)，如果不存在則為 。

span.span: The typed object requested, if it is present or if it is not.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法可要求型別物件，例如，用來從通道堆疊中的適當層次設定屬性或取得狀態的介面。Use this method to request a typed object such as an interface for setting properties or getting status from the appropriate layer in the channel stack. 如果某個層次支援傳回要求的物件，它就會傳回物件。If a layer supports returning the requested object, it returns it. 如果不是，則會將呼叫向下委派到堆疊中的下一層。If not, it delegates the call down to the next layer in the stack. 如果到達堆疊的底部，而且沒有任何通道層支援要求的物件，則該方法會傳回 `null`。If it gets to the bottom of the stack and no channel layer supported the requested object, then the method returns `null`.

MemberSignature.Value: public Uri Uri { get; }
.property instance class System.Uri Uri
Public ReadOnly Property Uri As Uri
public: property Uri ^ Uri { Uri ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得 URI，處理站所產生的接聽程式會在此 URI 上接聽。

span.span: Gets the URI on which the listeners that are generated by the factory listen.

value.span: 處理站所產生之接聽程式接聽所在的 。

span.span: The on which the listeners that are generated by the factory listen.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 URI 表示 正在接聽訊息的傳輸位址。This URI represents the transport address on which the is listening for messages.
